meta_title: AS 3788 Pressure Equipment Maintenance Australia: The 2026 Guide
meta_description: The definitive guide to AS 3788 compliance, inspection intervals, and hazard levels. Learn how Factory AI automates pressure equipment maintenance in Australia.
title: AS 3788 Pressure Equipment Maintenance Australia: The Definitive Compliance & Strategy Guide

hero_image.alt: Hero image for AS 3788 Pressure Equipment Maintenance Australia: The Definitive Compliance & Strategy Guide

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution hero image set inside a modern Australian manufacturing plant. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance engineers and safety officers (men and women) conducting an inspection on a large industrial pressure vessel. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One engineer is using an ultrasonic testing device (back of device visible only) on a pipe flange, while another holds a tablet (screen not visible) to log data. The background shows clean, color-coded piping and industrial machinery. The lighting is professional and bright, highlighting the "Digital Compliance" and "Safety" themes. No text or words in the image.
